title: Forecasting Stock Volatility with BERT
description: Financial news moves markets faster than humans can read. We fine-tuned a BERT transformer model to ingest unstructured financial headlines and classify stock price movements, bridging the gap between qualitative news and quantitative trading signals.

title: VibeRecommender: Mood-First Audio Engine
description: To gain granular control over playlist energy, I built a content-based recommender that uses 7D audio feature vectors (danceability, valence, etc.) and time-aware personas. It complements traditional collaborative filtering by strictly adhering to the user's desired 'vibe'.
result: Feature: 'Vibe Roulette' uses datetime logic to automate context-aware playlists.

title: Predicting Game Engagement on Steam
description: Steam allows refunds if a game is played for less than 2 hours. We engineered a recommender system that targets 'Commitment' (>2 hrs) rather than just clicks. We implemented a Hybrid Negative Sampling strategy (Unowned + Abandoned games) to maximize user retention.
result: Outcome: 0.88 AUC. Achieved 79% accuracy in predicting refund-proof engagement.

title: Hybrid U-Net for Climate Emulation
description: Physics-based climate simulations are computationally expensive. I engineered a Hybrid U-Net + Fourier Neural Operator (FNO) to emulate complex climate dynamics 100x faster than traditional solvers.
result: Impact: Kaggle Top 22/83. Reduced RMSE to 1.31 for global temp projections.

title: Meta Stock Quantitative Strategy
description: Can machine learning identify market opportunities? I built a quantitative trading system for Meta (META) stock utilizing XGBoost to identify buy/sell signals based on volatility, RSI, and MACD indicators.
result: Performance: 3.82 Sharpe Ratio and $9,401 profit in historical backtesting.

title: Visualizing Algorithmic Bias in Healthcare
description: AI models are often 'black boxes' that obscure discrimination. We built an interactive dashboard exposing how opioid prescription algorithms disproportionately deny care to Asian women, highlighting the need for algorithmic transparency.
result: Finding: Visualized a 79% denial rate disparity using real-world medical datasets.

title: Real-Time Robotics Classification
description: Real-time classification system for robotics hardware. I scraped a custom dataset and utilized Transfer Learning (MobileNetV2) to train a lightweight model capable of distinguishing between drones, rovers, and arms with limited data.
result: Metrics: 56% Improved Accuracy on custom scraped dataset.

title: Quantifying the 'Home Court' Advantage
description: Does the '12th Man' actually exist? We conducted a deep statistical analysis of 20,000+ NBA and NFL games to quantify the psychological and statistical impact of home crowds on point differentials.
result: Result: Confirmed statistical significance (p < 0.001) of crowd impact on game outcomes.
